title: How to Make Shampoo With Hibiscus Flowers and Leaves

steps.title: Pick fresh hibiscus flowers and leaves.
steps.content: Pick fresh hibiscus flowers and leaves. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Wash the leaves to remove any dirt present on them.
steps.content: Wash the leaves to remove any dirt present on them.

steps.title: Gently remove petals from the flowers.
steps.content: Gently remove petals from the flowers.

steps.title: Put the leaves and petals in a container.
steps.content: Put the leaves and petals in a container. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Soak them for 10-15 minutes.
steps.content: Soak them for 10-15 minutes. This makes them soft and tender. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Put them in a blender and blend until smooth.
steps.content: Put them in a blender and blend until smooth.

steps.title: You'll get a very sticky paste.
steps.content: You'll get a very sticky paste. Collect the paste in a container .Your Hibiscus shampoo is ready now.

steps.title: Use this to get soft and silky hair.
steps.content: Use this to get soft and silky hair.
